term.title: detoxification

item.text: Process, or processes, of chemical modification which make a toxic molecule less toxic.
Treatment of patients suffering from poisoning in such a way as to promote physiological processes which reduce the probability or severity of harmful effects.

term.sources: 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' Duffus, J.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1993 65(9) 2003
